# Red Converter - LLMs.txt
# https://red-conventer.airedcell.dev/

## Overview
Red Converter is a free, professional-grade text transformation and steganography web application. It provides 30+ encoding, encryption, and obfuscation algorithms that run entirely client-side in the browser.

## Key Facts
- Name: Red Converter
- Version: 2.0
- Type: Progressive Web Application (PWA)
- Author: AI RedCell (https://www.airedcell.dev/)
- License: MIT (Open Source)
- Privacy: 100% client-side processing - no data leaves the user's device
- Offline: Works completely offline after first visit

## Primary Use Cases
1. Text encoding and decoding (Base64, Base32, Base58, Base85, Hex, Binary)
2. Steganography (hiding text in zero-width characters or carrier text)
3. Text obfuscation (homoglyphs, leetspeak, emoji encoding)
4. Classical ciphers (Caesar, ROT13, Vigenère, Atbash, Affine, Rail Fence)
5. Modern encryption (AES-256, XOR)
6. Format conversion (Morse Code, Braille, URL encoding, HTML entities)
7. CTF (Capture The Flag) challenges
8. Red team/security testing text manipulation

## Supported Algorithms

### Base Encodings
- Base64 (standard)
- Base32 (RFC 4648)
- Base58 (Bitcoin-style)
- Base85 / ASCII85
- Hexadecimal
- Binary (7-bit and 8-bit)

### Ciphers
- Caesar Cipher (configurable shift)
- ROT13
- ROT47
- ROT-N (custom shift)
- Atbash
- Vigenère Cipher
- XOR Cipher
- AES-256 Encryption
- Affine Cipher
- Rail Fence Cipher
- Bacon Cipher
- Polybius Square

### Steganography
- Zero-Width Character Steganography
- Homoglyph Substitution (Cyrillic lookalikes)
- Whitespace Encoding (tabs/spaces)
- Case-Based Encoding

### Emoji Encoding
- Emoji Alphabet
- Binary Emoji (circles)
- Base64 Emoji
- Skin Tone Steganography
- Emoji Noise Injection

### Text Utilities
- Morse Code
- Braille
- URL Encoding
- HTML Entities
- Unicode Escape
- Leetspeak (light/heavy)
- Case Conversion

## Pipeline Feature
Users can chain multiple transformations in sequence. Example: Input → Base64 → ROT13 → Zero-Width Steganography → Output

## Technical Details
- Framework: React with TypeScript
- Build: Vite
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Animations: Framer Motion
- Storage: IndexedDB for history
- PWA: Service Worker for offline support

## Contact
Organization: AI RedCell
Founder: Shehan Nilukshan
Website: https://www.airedcell.dev/
GitHub: https://github.com/AI-RedCell/red-converter
